thread.section_title: Lookupfare Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lookupfare | lookupfare.com
thread.title: Stephanie Guth

author: Stephanie Guth
title: Stephanie Guth
text: I purchased a round-trip ticket but when I called the airport to confirm my flight, the airport staff told me it was cancelled. I called the Lookupfare helpline and the representative not only found out why my flight was cancelled, he transferred my reservation to the next available flight WITHOUT an extra charge. He made sure that I would not miss the funeral; I don't know what I would have done without his help. I highly recommend their services!
